fulltext:
My Curriculum Vitae 
PROFILE 
Full Name: 
 Dinh Ngoc Bac. 
Gender: 
 Male. 
Birthday: 
 04/09/1993. 
Marital Status: Single. 
Nationality: 
Vietnamese. 
Address:            1368/11 Phuoc Kien - Nha Be – Ho Chi Minh City. 
Phone Number:    0969781201. 
Email:                    Backaka93@gmail.com 
EDUCATION BACKGROUND 
 Graduate bachelor of computer science at FPT - Greenwich University in July 2016. 
DESCRIPTION 
 I have 2 years of practical software development experience. I can work under high 
pressure and willing to learn new programming languages as required by the project.  
 A good team player to effectively work in a dedicated team. 
 Trying to learn as much as possible and do my best to accomplish my task. 
 Having good opportunities to get promotion in my job. 
 My goal is to become a project manager. 
SKILLS 
 Experience with winform, web form, web api. 
 Back end:  2 years’ experience with C#, vb.net, vb6, vba. 
 Front end: basic knowledge html, css, bootstrap… 
 Database: 2 years’ experience with sql server and oracle. 
 Tool: Visual Studio, sql server, oracle sql developer , postman… 
 Experience working with svn, git. 
 Teamwork, Task management, Self-learning skill. 
LANGUAGE 
 English: communication.
EXPERIENCE 
 Time: 08/2016 – 12/2016 
Software Developer at FPT-Software Company (HCM city) 
Project Name: NICHIRIN. 
Project Description: Develop application create Tool to log/manage timesheet 
of employee. 
Responsibilities: 
 Study and analysis requirement from customer. 
 Create functionalities follow by PM’s requirement. 
Technologies Used:  
 C # 
 Mssql 
 Time: 01/2017 – 04/2017 
Software Developer at FPT-Software Company (HCM city) 
Project Name: MARUKAMI. 
Project Description:  
Migration multi-projects from VB6 to VB.NET. 
 Responsibilities: 
 Study and analyst document of vb6. 
 Create user control to function in vb.net. 
 Migration vb6 to vb.net and test function. 
Technologies Used:  
 Vb6, vb.net 
 Mssql 
 Time: 05/2017 – 11/2017 
Software Developer at FPT-Software Company (HCM city) 
Project Name: CPD_ODC. 
Project Description:  
Build the store's inventory management system. 
 Responsibilities:  
 Study and analysis requirement from customer. 
 Meeting and discuss with customer. 
 Create detail design document from basic design document of customer. 
 Create stored procedure. 
 Build five screens based on detailed design document. 
Technologies Used:  
 C# (client) 
 Java (server) 
 Oracle (database) 
 Time: 01/2018 – 04/2018 
Software Developer at Nichietsu Company (HCM city) 
Project Name: Migration (Onsite at customer's company : NEC company). 
Project Description:  
Migration vb6 to vb.net. 
 Responsibilities:  
 Meeting and discuss with customer. 
 Fix bug and define pattern. 
 Migration vb6 to vb.net and test function. 
Technologies Used:  
 Vb6, vb.net 
 Mssql 
 Time: 05/2018 – 07/2018 
Software Developer at Nichietsu Company (HCM city) 
Project Name: Ewallet. 
Project Description:  
Build system virtual currency investment based on the multi 
level marketing model (MLM). 
 Responsibilities:  
 Analysis requirement from customer. 
 Meeting and discuss with customer. 
 Research api blockchain. 
 Create function get api block chain and handle to display. 
Technologies Used:  
 C # (web mvc) 
 Javascript 
 Mssql 
 Time: 07/2018 – 08/2018 
Software Developer at Nichietsu Company (HCM city) 
Project Name: Gyoumu and Kytech. 
Project Description:  
These are the two production line management projects in a 
factory. 
 Responsibilities:  
 Meeting and receive requests from customers. 
 Maintenance, bug fixes and upgrade the system. 
Technologies Used:  
 C # (web service of project gyoumu) 
 Vb.net (winform of project kytech) 
 Mssql 
 Time: 08/2018 – present 
Software Developer at Nichietsu Company (HCM city) 
Project Name:Ipad. 
Project Description:  
Build warehouse management running on the mobile platform. 
 Responsibilities:  
 Analysis requirement. 
 Write api function, design UI with Unity. 
 Handling logic for each screen. 
 Support member in team 
Technologies Used:  
 C # 
 Unity for design UI 
 Mssql  
HOBBY: 
I really like football… It is a part of my life. 
Dinh Ngoc Bac 
Powered by TCPDF (www.tcpdf.org)
